name: Searoute MCP
description: An MCP server that computes oceangoing routes and geodesic distances using searoute and geopy.

tools.name: compute_distance
tools.description: Compute shortest oceangoing route distance (nm) between two coordinates.

tools.name: compute_route
tools.description: Compute oceangoing route geometry and distance (nm) between two coordinates.

tools.name: compute_geodesic
tools.description: Compute ellipsoidal geodesic distance (nm) between two coordinates.
